verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto the prince <S%H5057><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because your heart <S%H3820><s%> is lifted up <S%H1361><s%>, and you have said <S%H559><s%>, I am a god <S%H410><s%>, I sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, in the midst <S%H3820><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>; yet you are man <S%H120><s%>, and not God <S%H410><s%>, though you did set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>;—
behold <S%H2450><s%>, you are wiser than Daniel <S%H1840><s%>; there is no secret <S%H5640><s%> that is hidden from you <S%H5640><s%>;

by your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and by your understanding <S%H8394><s%> you have gotten <S%H6213><s%> you riches <S%H2428><s%>, and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> into your treasures <S%H214><s%>;

by your great <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and by your traffic <S%H7404><s%> have you increased <S%H7235><s%> your riches <S%H2428><s%>, and your heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted up <S%H1361><s%> because of your riches <S%H2428><s%>;—
therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because you have set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3824><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>,

therefore <S%H935><s%>, behold, I will bring strangers <S%H2114><s%> upon you <S%H6184><s%>, the terrible of the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and they shall draw <S%H7324><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against the beauty <S%H3308><s%> of your wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and they shall defile <S%H2490><s%> your brightness <S%H3314><s%>.

They shall bring you down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H7845><s%>; and you shall die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4463><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%>, in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>.

Will you yet <S%H559><s%> say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him that slays <S%H2026><s%> you <S%H430><s%>, I am God? but you are man <S%H120><s%>, and not God <S%H410><s%>, in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him that woundeth you <S%H2490><s%>.

You shall die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%>: for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: You sealest up <S%H2856><s%> the sum <S%H8508><s%>, full <S%H4392><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and perfect <S%H3632><s%> in beauty <S%H3308><s%>.

You were in Eden <S%H5731><s%>, the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; every precious <S%H3368><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> was your covering <S%H4540><s%>, the sardius <S%H124><s%>, the topaz <S%H6357><s%>, and the diamond <S%H3095><s%>, the beryl <S%H8658><s%>, the onyx <S%H7718><s%>, and the jasper <S%H3471><s%>, the sapphire <S%H5601><s%>, the emerald <S%H5306><s%>, and the carbuncle <S%H1304><s%>, and gold <S%H2091><s%>: the workmanship <S%H4399><s%> of your tabrets <S%H8596><s%> and of your pipes <S%H5345><s%> was in you <S%H3117><s%>; in the day that you were created <S%H1254><s%> they were prepared <S%H3559><s%>.

You were the anointed <S%H4473><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> that covers <S%H5526><s%>: and I set <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H6944><s%>, so that you were upon the holy mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; you have walked up and down <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.
You were perfect <S%H8549><s%> in your ways <S%H1870><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were created <S%H1254><s%>, until unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> was found in you <S%H4672><s%>.

By the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of your traffic <S%H7404><s%> they filled <S%H4390><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you with violence <S%H2555><s%>, and you have sinned <S%H2398><s%>: therefore have I cast you as profane <S%H2490><s%> out of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; and I have destroyed <S%H6><s%> you <S%H5526><s%>, O covering cherub <S%H3742><s%>, from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.

Your heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted up <S%H1361><s%> because of your beauty <S%H3308><s%>; you have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> by reason of <S%H5921><s%> your brightness <S%H3314><s%>: I have cast <S%H7993><s%> you to the ground <S%H776><s%>; I have laid <S%H5414><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>, that they may behold you <S%H7200><s%>.

By the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, in the unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> of your traffic <S%H7404><s%>, you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%>; therefore have I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H398><s%>; it has devoured you <S%H5414><s%>, and I have turned you to ashes <S%H665><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all them that behold you <S%H7200><s%>.

All they that know <S%H3045><s%> you among the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at you <S%H1091><s%>: you are become a terror, and you shall <S%H369><s%> nevermore have any being <S%H5704><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, and prophesy against it <S%H5012><s%>,

and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H6721><s%>, I am against you, O Sidon; and I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in her <S%H6942><s%>, and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will send <S%H7971><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into her <S%H1818><s%>, and blood into her streets <S%H2351><s%>; and the wounded <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her <S%H2719><s%>, with the sword upon her on every side <S%H5439><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And there shall be no more a pricking <S%H3992><s%> brier <S%H5544><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, nor a hurting <S%H3510><s%> thorn <S%H6975><s%> of any that are round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H7590><s%>, that did despite unto them <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: When I shall have gathered <S%H6908><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> among whom they are scattered <S%H6327><s%>, and shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, then shall they live <S%H3427><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> to my servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And they shall live <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> in it <S%H1129><s%>; Yes, they shall build houses <S%H1004><s%>, and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, and shall live <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, when I have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon all those that do them despite <S%H7590><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.
